long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Superchat enhances your Whatsapp experience by adding useful add-ons.

Bug Fixes and much more!

We have added a new Translation feature that translates messages that you receive. You can have a unique language settings for each user you chat with!

APPS:

Polls: Now you run a quick poll in your group and post the results without leaving Whatsapp!
Translation: Automatically translate incoming and outgoing messages across 29 languages.

GAMES:

Dhruvle: A Whatsapp version of the popular Wordle game. Challenge people with a 5 letter word and have them guess!

More apps and game coming, install and have fun. It is FREE!
